attributes.action: Ban all Postal Advertising (Junk Mail) Making it illegal to send adverts directly through the post.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leaflet posting and adding advertising inserts to mail should also be outlawed. This would help the environment by saving trees and reducing pollution from inks etc. It would also reduce the amount of landfill.  To replace the loss of advertising a monthly National or Regional publication containing all the special offers and new products could be made available at council offices and libraries.  Also a website with the same information could be made available so that a person knows where to look when they decide that they want to buy something.
